crystals.name: Blue Soul Crystal
crystals.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. 26 MP is consumed each time it is used.

crystals.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 1
crystals.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls, stage 1. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. 26 MP is consumed each time it is used.

crystals.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 10
crystals.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls, stage 10. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Each use consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it automatically absorbs souls. Therefore, no targeting is necessary.

crystals.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 11
crystals.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls, stage 11. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary.

crystals.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 12
crystals.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls, stage 12. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary.

crystals.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 13
crystals.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. 26 MP is consumed each time it is used.

crystals.name: Broken Blue Soul Crystal
crystals.description: A blue-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal inbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless.

crystals.name: Broken Green Soul Crystal
crystals.description: A green-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal inbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless.

crystals.name: Broken Red Soul Crystal
crystals.description: A red-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal inbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless.

crystals.name: Charm of Courage: No Grade
crystals.description: Prevents Exp. loss if killed during a siege war. (For Level 1 - Level 19)

crystals.name: Lucky Charm
crystals.description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is 19 or below.

crystals.name: Lucky Charm: A-Grade
crystals.description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 61 and 75.

crystals.name: Lucky Charm: B-Grade
crystals.description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 52 and 60.

crystals.name: Lucky Charm: C-Grade
crystals.description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 40 and 51.

crystals.name: Lucky Charm: D-Grade
crystals.description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self, by a character whose level is between 20 and 39.

crystals.name: Lucky Charm: S-Grade
crystals.description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is 76 or higher.

crystals.name: Soul Ore
crystals.description: A material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop.

crystals.description: Prevents Exp. loss if killed during a siege war. (For Level 20 - Level 39)

crystals.description: Prevents Exp. loss if killed during a siege war. (For Level 20 - Level 39)

crystals.name: Blue Primeval Crystal
crystals.description: Increases SP by 50000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.

crystals.name: Charm of Courage: S-Grade
crystals.description: Prevents Exp. loss if killed during a siege war (for Level 76 - Level 80). Can also be used by characters below level 76.

crystals.description: A crystal of S Grade.

crystals.name: Green Primeval Crystal
crystals.description: Increases SP by 100000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.

crystals.name: Red Primeval Crystal
crystals.description: Increases SP by 200000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.
